roleset.name: furrow
roleset.note: CRINKLE-V NOTES: Automatically created based 'furrow', 'extend'. Edited by hwangd. Member of VNcls bend-45.2, also see VNcls other_cos-45.4 (from crinkle.01-v)

example.name: Transitive
example.text: An insouciant grin crinkled the tiny man's features.

example.name: Intransitive
example.text: This makes it affordable, but it crinkles easily.
